00013 CTask::CTask() {
00014        m_handleTask = NULL;
00015 }
00016 
00017 CTask::CTask(xTaskHandle handleTask) {
00018        Attach(handleTask);
00019 }
00020 
00021 CTask::~CTask() {
00022        if (IsValid())
00023               Delete();
00024 }
00025 
00026 void CTask::Attach(xGenericHandle handle) {
00027        assert(handle != NULL);
00028 
00029        if (IsValid()) {
00030               Delete();
00031        }
00032        m_handleTask = handle;
00033 }
00034 
00035 portBASE_TYPE CTask::Create(pdTASK_CODE pvTaskCode, const portCHAR * const pcName, unsigned portSHORT usStackDepth, void *pvParameters, unsigned portBASE_TYPE uxPriority)
00036 {
00037        portBASE_TYPE res;
00038        xTaskHandle handle;
00039        res = xTaskCreate(pvTaskCode, (const signed char*)pcName, usStackDepth, pvParameters, uxPriority, &handle);
00040        if (res == pdTRUE)
00041               Attach(handle);
00042 
00043        return res;
00044 }
00045 
00046 portBASE_TYPE CTask::CreateRestricted(xTaskParameters *pxTaskDefinition)
00047 {
00048        portBASE_TYPE res = pdFALSE;
00049 #if( portUSING_MPU_WRAPPERS == 1 )
00050        xTaskHandle handle;
00051        res = xTaskCreateRestricted(pxTaskDefinition, &handle);
00052        if (res == pdTRUE)
00053               Attach(handle);
00054 #endif
00055 
00056        return res;
00057 }
00058 
00059 
00060 void CTask::Delete() {
00061        if (m_handleTask != NULL) {
00062 #if ( INCLUDE_vTaskDelete == 1 )
00063               vTaskDelete(m_handleTask);
00064 #else
00065               vTaskSuspend(m_handleTask);
00066 #endif
00067               m_handleTask = NULL;
00068        }
00069 }
